text: Rudy Hayes (January 12, 1935 – February 15, 2020) was an American football linebacker. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 1959 to 1960 and in 1962. He died on February 15, 2020, in Pickens, South Carolina at age 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:Clemson Tigers football players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players
title: Rudy Hayes
